programme.title: Napoleon Bonaparte: The Russian Campaign
programme.desc: Since his victory over Tsar Alexander in 1807 and the Treaty of Tilsit, France and Russia are officially allies. But Alexander doesn't support Napoleon's expansionist strategy. To Napoleon, Russia's behavior makes it an enemy of France. Ignoring calls for caution, Napoleon invades Russia in 1811.

programme.title: Battlezone WWII: The U.S. Army Air Forces
programme.sub-title: The Memphis Belle (in Color): Flying Fortress B-17
programme.desc: Famous Documentary on the B-17 crew and bomber.

programme.title: Napoleon Bonaparte: The Egyptian Campaign
programme.desc: The Directoire had ordered Napoleon Bonaparte to threaten English assets in the Indies by planning a lasting occupation of Egypt. But the country had many surprises in store for all on the mission. We follow this military expedition through the eyes of two young scientists, Villiers and Jollois, who spent three long years enthusiastically trying to spread the ideas of the Enlightenment.

programme.title: Heroes Never Die: The Miniseries
programme.desc: With English Closed Captions. Pro-Russian separatists are planning to shell the airport. The night is calm, but in the morning they are attacked with tanks. The fighters repulse the offensive, Injuries and losses mount, However, the defense of the airport is successful and and new group of Ukrainian fighters arrive at the airport to continue the fight.

programme.desc: Valley Forge...Gettysburg...Wounded Knee...San Juan Hill...the Somme...Omaha Beach...Inchon...Saigon...Basra. Combat War Channel delivers the complete history of America and our allies at war as never before!

programme.desc: Valley Forge...Gettysburg...Wounded Knee...San Juan Hill...the Somme...Omaha Beach...Inchon...Saigon...Basra. Combat War Channel delivers the complete history of America and our allies at war as never before!

programme.title: Napoleon Bonaparte: The Egyptian Campaign
programme.desc: The Directoire had ordered Napoleon Bonaparte to threaten English assets in the Indies by planning a lasting occupation of Egypt. But the country had many surprises in store for all on the mission. We follow this military expedition through the eyes of two young scientists, Villiers and Jollois, who spent three long years enthusiastically trying to spread the ideas of the Enlightenment.

programme.title: Napoleon Bonaparte: The Egyptian Campaign
programme.desc: Exploring Egypt proved more challenging than anticipated. Between the cultural shock, divergence of interests between the military and scientific communities, the epic combat with Mamelukes and Ottomans, popular uprisings, and outbreaks of the plague, this was an expedition to remember.

programme.title: Combat War Channel
programme.desc: Valley Forge...Gettysburg...Wounded Knee...San Juan Hill...the Somme...Omaha Beach...Inchon...Saigon...Basra. Combat War Channel delivers the complete history of America and our allies at war as never before!

programme.title: Combat War Channel
programme.desc: Valley Forge...Gettysburg...Wounded Knee...San Juan Hill...the Somme...Omaha Beach...Inchon...Saigon...Basra. Combat War Channel delivers the complete history of America and our allies at war as never before!

programme.title: Thunder Run on Baghdad
programme.desc: The Iraqis wait, divided between hope and fear. Members of the military attempt to save face, knowing that their equipment, which dates at best from the early 1970s, will not weigh heavily against the five hundred armored tanks and seventy thousand men who are equipped with the very latest technology.

programme.title: Thunder Run on Baghdad
programme.desc: The Americans are getting ready to seize Baghdad airport, in what is to be the sole battle of this war. Opposite them: the Republican Guard led by Saddam Hussein's son Qusay. Dr. Hana Hammed, an Iraqi woman, wants to meet Qusay in order to have her husband, a prisoner in Abu Ghraib, released.

programme.title: Afghanistan 1979-1989
programme.desc: Unraveling the causes requires examining geopolitical dynamics, ideological factors, and strategic interests. Through historical records, primary sources, and testimonies, this project aims to comprehend the complex motivations behind the Soviet intervention in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Afghanistan 1979-1989
programme.desc: Accurate coverage is crucial due to the war's prolonged duration and subsequent overshadowing by other global events. By exploring diverse sources like eyewitness accounts and official documents, the project aims to present a truthful and comprehensive narrative of the Afghan war.

programme.title: Afghanistan 1979-1989
programme.desc: By analyzing different perspectives and narratives, this research aims to contribute to a better understanding of this significant chapter in Soviet and Afghan history. It seeks to shed light on the multifaceted causes that led to the conflict and rectify its 'forgotten' status, ensuring its rightful place in the historical record.

programme.title: Combat War Channel
programme.desc: Valley Forge...Gettysburg...Wounded Knee...San Juan Hill...the Somme...Omaha Beach...Inchon...Saigon...Basra. Combat War Channel delivers the complete history of America and our allies at war as never before!

programme.title: World of Warships Clash of Titans
programme.desc: In 1941, Japan attacks Pearl Harbor, aiming to destroy the U.S. fleet and control the Pacific.

programme.title: World of Warships Clash of Titans
programme.desc: In May 1941, the British Royal Navy pursues the battleship Bismarck with the mission to sink.
